Effect.en: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can send 1 "Orcust" or "World Legacy" card from your Deck to the GY, then, if 2 or more other cards are in this card's column, this card is treated as a Tuner this turn. If you control no other monsters: You can Special Summon 1 "World Legacy Token" (Machine/DARK/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0) to both players' fields in Defense Position. You can only use each effect of "Mekk-Knight Orcust Girsu" once per turn.

en: Send from deck to the GY
